desc: Gastrodon is a Water and Ground-type Pokemon. It is the evolved form of Shellos. Gastrodon has two forms, East Sea and West Sea, and its appearance varies based on its habitat.

name: Ambipom
desc: Ambipom is a Normal-type Pokemon. It is the evolved form of Aipom and is known for its dexterous hand-like tails. Ambipom is highly skilled at using its tails in various tasks.

name: Drifloon
desc: Drifloon is a Ghost and Flying-type Pokemon. It is a balloon-like Pokemon known for luring children away by holding their hands. Drifloon evolves into Drifblim.

name: Drifblim
desc: Drifblim is the evolved form of Drifloon. It is a Ghost and Flying-type Pokemon known for its large balloon body. Drifblim can carry people and Pokemon in the air.

name: Buneary
desc: Buneary is a Normal-type Pokemon. It is a cute rabbit Pokemon known for its long ears. Buneary is often seen bouncing and hopping around.

name: Lopunny
desc: Lopunny is the evolved form of Buneary. It is a Normal-type Pokemon known for its graceful appearance. Lopunny has a Mega Evolution form with the addition of Fighting-type.

name: Mismagius
desc: Mismagius is a Ghost-type Pokemon. It is the evolved form of Misdreavous and is known for its magical and mystical powers. Mismagius is often associated with the supernatural.

name: Honchkrow
desc: Honchkrow is a Dark and Flying-type Pokemon. It is the evolved form of Murkrow and is known for its leadership in a group of Murkrow. Honchkrow is often associated with the mafia in the Pokemon world.

name: Glameow
desc: Glameow is a Normal-type Pokemon. It is a cat-like Pokemon known for its graceful and elegant movements. Glameow evolves into Purugly.

name: Purugly
desc: Purugly is the evolved form of Glameow. It is a Normal-type Pokemon known for its obesity and aggressive behavior. Despite its appearance, Purugly is a fast and agile Pokemon.

name: Chingling
desc: Chingling is a Psychic-type Pokemon. It is the pre-evolved form of Chimecho and is known for its resonating sound. Chingling often emits soothing chime-like noises.

name: Stunky
desc: Stunky is a Poison and Dark-type Pokemon. It is a skunk-like Pokemon known for its foul odor. Stunky evolves into Skuntank.

name: Skuntank
desc: Skuntank is the evolved form of Stunky. It is a Poison and Dark-type Pokemon known for its powerful stench and the ability to spray a foul-smelling liquid as a defense mechanism.

name: Bronzor
desc: Bronzor is a Steel and Psychic-type Pokemon. It is known for its metallic appearance and ability to levitate. Bronzor has a serene and calm demeanor.

name: Bronzong
desc: Bronzong is the evolved form of Bronzor. It is a Steel and Psychic-type Pokemon known for its temple bell-like appearance. Bronzong is often associated with ancient traditions.

name: Bonsly
desc: Bonsly is a Rock-type Pokemon. It is the baby form of Sudowoodo and is known for mimicking a bonsai tree. Bonsly often tries to blend in with real bonsai trees.

name: Mime Jr.
desc: Mime Jr. is a Psychic and Fairy-type Pokemon. It is the pre-evolved form of Mr. Mime and is known for miming and mimicking human actions. Mime Jr. often performs in circuses.

name: Happiny
desc: Happiny is a Normal-type Pokemon. It is the baby form of Chansey and is known for carrying a Lucky Egg. Happiny often brings happiness to those around it.

name: Chatot
desc: Chatot is a Normal and Flying-type Pokemon. It is known for its ability to mimic sounds and melodies. Chatot often repeats the sounds it hears, including human speech.

name: Spiritomb
desc: Spiritomb is a Ghost and Dark-type Pokemon. It is known for its unique typing and the fact that it is formed from 108 trapped spirits. Spiritomb has a mysterious and eerie aura.

name: Gible
desc: Gible is a Dragon and Ground-type Pokemon. It is known for its love of digging and creating tunnels. Gible evolves into Gabite.

name: Gabite
desc: Gabite is the evolved form of Gible. It is a Dragon and Ground-type Pokemon known for its powerful jaws and the ability to use its fins as blades. Gabite evolves into Garchomp.

name: Garchomp
desc: Garchomp is a Dragon and Ground-type Pokemon. It is the evolved form of Gabite and is known for its incredible speed and power. Garchomp has a Mega Evolution form with added Dragon-type.

name: Munchlax
desc: Munchlax is a Normal-type Pokemon. It is the baby form of Snorlax and is known for its insatiable appetite. Munchlax is often seen eating and sleeping.

name: Riolu
desc: Riolu is a Fighting-type Pokemon. It is the baby form of Lucario and is known for its determination and strong sense of justice. Riolu evolves into Lucario.

name: Lucario
desc: Lucario is a Fighting and Steel-type Pokemon. It is known for its aura-sensing abilities and mastery of martial arts. Lucario has a Mega Evolution form with increased power.

name: Hippopotas
desc: Hippopotas is a Ground-type Pokemon. It is known for its ability to create sandstorms and bury itself in the sand. Hippopotas evolves into Hippowdon.

name: Hippowdon
desc: Hippowdon is the evolved form of Hippopotas. It is a Ground-type Pokemon known for its massive size and the ability to control sandstorms in the desert.

name: Skorupi
desc: Skorupi is a Poison and Bug-type Pokemon. It is known for its scorpion-like appearance and the ability to use its tail for defense and striking. Skorupi evolves into Drapion.

name: Drapion
desc: Drapion is the evolved form of Skorupi. It is a Poison and Dark-type Pokemon known for its powerful stinger and ability to move silently in the dark. Drapion is often used by Team Galactic.

name: Croagunk
desc: Croagunk is a Poison and Fighting-type Pokemon. It is known for secreting toxic sweat and using poison-based attacks. Croagunk evolves into Toxicroak.

name: Toxicroak
desc: Toxicroak is the evolved form of Croagunk. It is a Poison and Fighting-type Pokemon known for its deadly punches and kicks infused with poison. Toxicroak is highly agile in battle.

name: Carnivine
desc: Carnivine is a Grass-type Pokemon. It is known for its carnivorous plant-like appearance and the ability to ensnare prey with its vines. Carnivine is often found in wetlands and swamps.

name: Finneon
desc: Finneon is a Water-type Pokemon. It is known for its elegant swimming patterns and the light it emits from its tail fin. Finneon evolves into Lumineon.

name: Lumineon
desc: Lumineon is the evolved form of Finneon. It is a Water-type Pokemon known for its graceful swimming and the ability to create beautiful patterns with its fins.

name: Mantyke
desc: Mantyke is a Water and Flying-type Pokemon. It is known for its gentle nature and the habit of carrying Remoraid on its underside. Mantyke evolves into Mantine.

name: Snover
desc: Snover is a Grass and Ice-type Pokemon. It is known for its snowy appearance and the ability to summon hailstorms. Snover evolves into Abomasnow.

name: Abomasnow
desc: Abomasnow is the evolved form of Snover. It is a Grass and Ice-type Pokemon known for its large, tree-like appearance and the ability to create blizzards. Abomasnow has a Mega Evolution form.

name: Weavile
desc: Weavile is a Dark and Ice-type Pokemon. It is known for its agility and sharp claws, which it uses to hunt prey. Weavile is often found in cold, mountainous regions.

name: Magnezone
desc: Magnezone is an Electric and Steel-type Pokemon. It is known for its magnetic properties and the ability to generate strong electromagnetic fields. Magnezone is the evolved form of Magneton.

name: Lickilicky
desc: Lickilicky is a Normal-type Pokemon. It is known for its long, stretchable tongue, which it uses to catch prey and groom itself. Lickilicky is the evolved form of Lickitung.

name: Rhyperior
desc: Rhyperior is the evolved form of Rhydon. It is a Ground and Rock-type Pokemon known for its incredible strength and the ability to cause earthquakes by stomping the ground.

name: Tangrowth
desc: Tangrowth is the evolved form of Tangela. It is a Grass-type Pokemon known for its long, vine-like arms and the ability to ensnare opponents. Tangrowth is often found in dense forests.

name: Electivire
desc: Electivire is the evolved form of Electabuzz. It is an Electric-type Pokemon known for its speed and the ability to generate powerful electric shocks from its body.

name: Magmortar
desc: Magmortar is the evolved form of Magmar. It is a Fire-type Pokemon known for its cannons that shoot superheated flames. Magmortar is often used by trainers in battles.

name: Togekiss
desc: Togekiss is the evolved form of Togetic. It is a Fairy and Flying-type Pokemon known for its kind and loving nature. Togekiss is often associated with spreading happiness and joy.

name: Yanmega
desc: Yanmega is the evolved form of Yanma. It is a Bug and Flying-type Pokemon known for its incredible speed and the ability to create powerful shockwaves with its wings.

name: Leafeon
desc: Leafeon is one of Eevee's evolution forms. It is a Grass-type Pokemon known for its affinity with nature and the ability to manipulate leaves. Leafeon evolves from Eevee when exposed to a Leaf Stone.

name: Glaceon
desc: Glaceon is one of Eevee's evolution forms. It is an Ice-type Pokemon known for its icy body and the ability to create intense cold. Glaceon evolves from Eevee when exposed to an Ice Stone.

name: Gliscor
desc: Gliscor is the evolved form of Gligar. It is a Ground and Flying-type Pokemon known for its impressive flying skills and the ability to glide silently through the night.

name: Mamoswine
desc: Mamoswine is the evolved form of Piloswine. It is an Ice and Ground-type Pokemon known for its size and power. Mamoswine is often used as a mount in snowy regions.

name: Porygon-Z
desc: Porygon-Z is the final form of Porygon. It is a Normal-type Pokemon known for its digital appearance and the ability to move freely in cyberspace. Porygon-Z is often used for data analysis and research.

name: Gallade
desc: Gallade is a Psychic and Fighting-type Pokemon. It is known for its chivalrous nature and the ability to sense the emotions of others. Gallade has a Mega Evolution form.

name: Probopass
desc: Probopass is a Rock and Steel-type Pokemon. It is known for its magnetic abilities and the peculiar appearance of its nose. Probopass is the evolved form of Nosepass.

name: Dusknoir
desc: Dusknoir is the evolved form of Dusclops. It is a Ghost-type Pokemon known for its ability to guide spirits to the afterlife. Dusknoir is often seen in haunted places.

name: Froslass
desc: Froslass is the evolved form of Snorunt. It is an Ice and Ghost-type Pokemon known for its icy beauty and the ability to freeze its prey. Froslass is often found in snowy areas.

name: Rotom

desc: Wo-Chien is a Legendary Pokemon with a unique combination of Dark and Grass types. Its Dark type grants it strengths against Ghost and Psychic moves, while its Grass type gives it an advantage against Water and Ground types.

name: Chien-Pao
desc: Chien-Pao is a Legendary Pokemon with a combination of Dark and Ice types. Its Dark type provides strengths against Ghost and Psychic moves, while its Ice type grants it an advantage against Dragon and Flying types.

name: Ting-Lu
desc: Ting-Lu is a Legendary Pokemon with a unique combination of Dark and Ground types. Its Dark type allows it to excel against Ghost and Psychic moves, while its Ground type grants it strengths against Electric and Rock types.

name: Chi-Yu
desc: Chi-Yu is a Legendary Pokemon with a combination of Dark and Fire types. Its Dark type grants it advantages against Ghost and Psychic moves, while its Fire type provides strengths against Bug, Grass, Ice, and Steel types.

name: Roaring Moon
desc: Roaring Moon is a dual-type Dragon and Dark Pokemon. Its combination of types allows it to excel against Dragon, Ghost, Psychic, and Dark types but makes it vulnerable to Fairy and Fighting moves.

name: Iron Valiant
desc: Iron Valiant is a dual-type Fairy and Fighting Pokemon. Its combination of types grants it advantages against Dark, Dragon, Fighting, Ice, Normal, Rock, Steel, and Dark moves, making it a powerful choice in battles.

name: Koraidon
desc: Koraidon is a Legendary Pokemon with a unique combination of Fighting and Dragon types. Its Fighting type allows it to excel against Normal, Ice, Rock, Steel, and Dark types, while its Dragon type grants it strengths against Dragon, Electric, and Fairy moves.

name: Miraidon
desc: Miraidon is a Legendary Pokemon with a combination of Electric and Dragon types. Its Electric type grants it strengths against Flying and Water types, while its Dragon type allows it to excel against Dragon, Electric, and Fairy moves.

name: Walking Wake
desc: Walking Wake is a dual-type Water and Dragon Pokemon. Its Water type provides advantages against Fire, Ground, and Rock moves, while its Dragon type allows it to excel against Dragon, Electric, and Fairy types.

name: Iron Leaves
desc: Iron Leaves is a dual-type Grass and Psychic Pokemon. Its Grass type grants it strengths against Ground, Rock, Water, and Electric moves, while its Psychic type allows it to excel against Fighting, Poison, and Psychic types.
